name: Black Star Square
description: Black Star Square is an iconic landmark in Accra, known for its historical significance and as a venue for national celebrations and events.

name: Accra Mall
description: Accra Mall is the largest shopping center in Ghana, offering a range of retail outlets, restaurants, and entertainment options.

name: Cape Coast Castle
description: Cape Coast Castle is a UNESCO World Heritage site with deep historical significance, especially in the transatlantic slave trade.

name: Kumasi City
description: Kumasi is the capital city of the Ashanti Region, known for its rich cultural heritage, historical landmarks, and the Kumasi Fort.

name: Takoradi
description: Takoradi is a coastal city with beautiful beaches, markets, and a bustling port, perfect for experiencing the lively atmosphere of the Western Region.

name: Wli Waterfalls
description: Wli Waterfalls is the highest waterfall in Ghana, located in the Volta Region. It's a popular destination for nature lovers and hiking enthusiasts.

name: Boti Falls
description: Boti Falls, located in the Eastern Region, offers stunning views, with two separate waterfalls and a peaceful environment for relaxation.

name: Shai Hills Reserve
address: Shai Hills, Greater Accra Region, Ghana
description: Shai Hills Reserve is a wildlife conservation area near Accra. It is home to various animal species, including baboons and antelopes, and offers scenic hiking trails.
